title: Ticket #2184: Squash ZKM messages at D_ALWAYS
description:
The majority of the lines of logs at our site are along these lines: 

05/21/11 16:11:50 ZKM: 1: attempting to map '/DC=org/DC=doegrids/OU=Services/CN=host/brian-test.unl.edu'
05/21/11 16:11:50 ZKM: 2: mapret: 0 included_voms: 0 canonical_user: brian-test@daemon.unl.edu
05/21/11 16:11:50 ZKM: successful mapping to brian-test@daemon.unl.edu

Zach, we love you ... but it's time to drop these to D_SECURITY.
check_ins: 2012-Feb-01 10:14   Check-in [30051]: Drop D_ALWAYS ZKM messages to D_SECURITY. Sorry Zach, #2184 (By Greg Thain )
creator: bbockelm
